data.name: Pixel Ripped 1995
data.description:
It’s time to get on the most nostalgic gaming ride of your life! On this Virtual Reality nostalgia trip, you have to join forces with our hero Dot to save the gaming world as we know it from the clutches of the evil Cyblin Lord and become the hero of Far-of-a-Land! During your adventures, you’ll find unique characters, games, and gaming systems that will guide you throughout the good ol’ 90s!

- Explore the human world in full virtual reality
- The gaming and human worlds collide and you have to manage each situation in this game within a game
- Get inside a plethora of 16 and 32-bit games and adapt to each genre they bring to the table
- Discover the lore of the Pixel Ripped franchise in this rich story full of plot twists and funny moments
- Witness loads of WTF moments that will get you laughing while playing
- Gorgeous scenarios with a vibing soundtrack
- 8 languages support for in-game interface and subtitles! (English, Brazilian Portuguese, French, German, Spanish, Japanese, Korean and Simplified Chinese)
- Amazing 90fps on Quest 2!

translations.long_description:
Pixel Ripped está de volta com um novo jogo dentro de um jogo em realidade virtual cheio de nostalgia, agora em 1995! Para recuperar o equilíbrio de múltiplas dimensões, nossa heroína Dot pede ajuda ao melhor gamer de 1995, um modesto garoto de nove anos chamado David. Junte-se a essa dupla improvável em desafios que relembram todos os clássicos favoritos: dos últimos games 16-bit aos primeiros da era 32-bit, dentro de um mundo em realidade virtual.
Pixel Ripped 95 evoca um genuíno sentimento nostálgico, como a adrenalina de jogar games depois que sua mãe te mandou para a cama, ou a emoção de encontrar o último lançamento da locadora. Você terá que fazer tudo isso por diversos ambientes - incluindo sua sala de estar, quarto, a locadora do bairro, o fliperama no cais e muito mais. Com seis fases totalmente originais, onde cada uma parece um jogo inteiramente novo, Pixel Ripped 1995 é uma jornada incrível tanto para jogadores de realidade virtual quanto para amantes de games retrôs.
translations.short_description: Pixel Ripped está de volta com um novo jogo dentro de um jogo em realidade virtual lotado de nostalgia, agora em 1995! No corpo de David, um garoto de nove anos com todas as angústias típicas da sua idade, ajude nossa heroína Dot a enfrentar os desafios de todos os seus clássicos em 16-bit e 32-bit.

translations.long_description:
Pixel Ripped est de retour avec un tout nouveau jeu de réalité virtuelle alimenté par la nostalgie, cette fois ci en 1995! Pour rétablir l'équilibre dans plusieurs dimensions, notre héros Dot recrute l'aide du meilleur joueur de 1995, un garçon de 9 ans sans prétention nommé David. Rejoignez ce duo improbable à travers des retours difficiles à tous vos jeux classiques préférés de la fin des consoles 16 bits et du début 32 bits dans un monde de réalité virtuelle.
 
Le jeu évoque un sentiment de nostalgie, comme l'adrénaline de jouer à des jeux après que votre mère vous a dit d'aller au lit, ou le plaisir de trouver ce tout nouveau jeu au magasin. Vous devez faire tout cela et encore plus dans plusieurs environnements - y compris votre salon, votre chambre, le magasin de location de jeux vidéos local, l'arcade, etc. Avec 6 niveaux entièrement originaux, où chacun se sent comme un tout nouveau jeu, Pixel Ripped 1995 est un voyage incroyable pour les joueurs VR et rétro.
translations.short_description: Pixel Ripped est de retour avec un tout nouveau jeu de réalité virtuelle alimenté par la nostalgie, cette fois en 1995! Aidez notre héros Dot à affronter des retours difficiles à tous vos jeux classiques préférés de 16 bits et 32 ​​bits  tout en survivant aux difficultés d'un enfant typique de neuf ans.

translations.long_description:
Pixel Ripped está de vuelta cargado de nostalgia para llevarte a un increíble mundo en Realidad Virtual con un nuevo juego dentro de otro juego, ¡esta vez en el año 1995! Con el objetivo de restablecer el equilibrio en múltiples dimensiones, nuestro héroe Dot recluta la ayuda del mejor jugador de 1995, un modesto niño de 9 años llamado David. Únete a este dúo en esta desafiante vuelta al pasado en VR, para revivir todos tus clásicos favoritos de finales de la era de 16 bits y principios de los 32 bits.

Sentirás la adrenalina de cuando jugabas sin que nadie te viese después de que tus padres te manden a dormir, o la emoción de encontrar el esperado juego en tu tienda de barrio. Prepárate a pasar por situaciones a través de múltiples escenarios, como la sala de estar, el dormitorio, el videoclub, el salón recreativo y más. Por los 6 niveles originales, cada uno como un nuevo juego, Pixel Ripped 1995 es un viaje que los retrogamers apasionados por la Realidad Virtual no olvidarán.
translations.short_description: ¡Pixel Ripped está de vuelta con un nuevo juego dentro de un juego en Realidad Virtual lleno de nostalgia, esta vez en el año 1995! Ayuda a nuestro héroe Dot a enfrentar la vuelta al pasado superando los desafìos de jugar dentro de todos tus juegos clásicos favoritos de la era de 16 y 32 bits mientras sobrevives al día a día de un típico niño de nueve años.

changelog.change_log:

- Added Chinese localization

We’ve been hard at work to resolve issues that users reported and to overall polish and improve the game! More updates and features coming soon. In this update: 

- Performance improvements in all levels.
- Balanced pixel distribution on Hardcore mode.
- Fixed level 6 bug that caused speech balloons not to properly show in front of the Game Hud.
- Fixed Level 1 bug that allowed players to walk out of the map.
- Fixed player feedback when picking up Collectables on Level 2.
- Polished player feedback when picking up collectables in the real world.
- Polished player feedback when unlocking skins, improving legibility. 
- Polished watch interactions to skip cutscenes.
- Fixed hand animation while holding the comic book.

We've been working really hard to improve the game experience for all types of players. This update is for you. If you are  looking for a little bit of a challenge, hunting collectables, rewards, secret endings, a new score system and overall  gameplay improvement with the new power up, the Ripped Mode. More updates and features coming soon. In this update:

- New Ripped Boost ability: This special move makes Dot superpowerful when she gathers enough pixels and allows hardcore players and speedrunners to devise new strategies for clearing each level.
- Hardcore Mode: Prove your skill in a new difficulty mode with tougher enemies and obstacles!
- Golden Cartridges: Find hidden collectables spread across all levels to unlock super-secret content! Rumor has it that something special might happen in the end of the game...
- Dot outfits: Unlock new armors that will prove that you are a true Pixel Ripped fan!
- Pixel Doors: Explore alternative routes that will only open for the best players!
- Interactive comic book: A fully original Pixel Ripped story added to David's room.
- New after-credits scene for all players.
- Score System and Level Records: Brag about your best score and time on each level!
- Cutscene Skip and built-in gameplay timer to improve the speedrunning/time-trial experience. 
- Several bug fixes and improvements for the overall experience.

We’ve been hard at work to resolve issues that users reported and to overall polish and improve the game! More updates and features coming soon. In this update:
 
- Implemented Dot’s Charge Attack on level 2 boss
- General Polish of level 2, 3 and 4
- Fixed issue on "Honey Pie" achievement
- General SFX polishing
- Improved object throwing

We’ve been hard at work to resolve issues that users reported and to overall polish and improve the game! More updates and features coming soon. In this update: 
- Added Save Game visual feedback
- Fixed bug that happened when Dot died before the first checkpoint on level 2
- Fixed volume settings bug when changing the game language
- Improved Dot’s movement dynamics when attacking on level 2 boss
- Improved camera stutter on level 6 forest
- Improved banana throw on level 2 boss
- Visual polishing on level 2 boss enemies

We've been hard at work to resolve issues that users reported and to overall polish and improve the game! More updates and features coming soon. In this update:

- Fixed Dot Underwater gravity Bug: Some users reported that after a few deaths during the water level, Dot would lose her gravity, making it impossible to progress.

- Analytics Implementation: To help us improve your game experience, we are collecting anonymous data about gameplay through Unity Analytics such as which checkpoints players are struggling the most. This data will help us to better understand critical issues of the game and make better design choices in future updates. We respect your privacy and if you not comfortable with sharing your data, you can opt out by clicking on the Privacy Settings in the in-game menu and following the instructions on your browser.

Head Tracking Bug: A small number of users reported an issue with the player camera in the game being locked to a fixed position, making it impossible to play. This update addresses the issue by changing the camera recenter system back to Oculus default. If you still encounter this issue after the update, please report it to us at contact@arvore.io or our Discord (https://discord.gg/5dJU6xY).

- Added visual feedback for when your hand is not holding the in-game virtual gamepad and you try to press buttons.

- Unlimited Bananas: Some users reported a bug that caused them to run out of bananas during the Level 2 Boss fight. We added unlimited bananas, so toss away!

- Level 4 Rebalancing: We received multiple feedbacks of the difficulty peak of level 4 being too high, so we rebalanced the level a bit and improved the visual feedback of the gameplay.

- Resolved an issue in Level 1 where if the mother turned off your console during a specific dialogue, Dot would get stuck.

- One player managed to jump behind Dr Dentist and get stuck in Level 2. We resolved the issue!

- Added Portuguese language translation. More languages coming soon!

- Added 1990s style Trading Cards featuring amazing content creators from the VR community.

- Other minor fixes and tweaks!
If you have any other issue, you can contact us through our Discord (https://discord.gg/5dJU6xY) or through email (contact@arvore.io) and we’ll get you in touch with the Dev team to understand your issue so we can get it fixed for you!
